projects.title: Fin-Tech Platform
projects.description: A full-featured Fin-tech platform with microservice architecture, money transfer with currency exchange, and payment processing. The application provides a seamless banking experience with fast page loads and responsive design.
projects.shortDescription: Modern Fin-tech solution with Spring Boot and microservice architecture
features: Auth Service: User authentication and authorization
User Service: User data management, including profile updates and account settings
Transaction Service: Secure and reliable processing of financial transactions and logs
Wallet Service: Digital wallet supporting multiple currencies and transaction history
Gateway & Discovery Service: Dynamic discovery of microservices and centralized routing
Credit Risk Prediction: ML-based assessment of borrowers for risk analysis

projects.title: Syndic Management
projects.description: Developed a web application using Laravel, Tailwind CSS, and Blade components to manage and monitor residents and residences, incorporating over five user roles for advanced access control and functionality.
projects.shortDescription: Web application for residence and resident management.
features: Mini social media for posting reclamations and problems, and commenting on posts

projects.shortDescription: Oracle database manager with React and Spring Boot.

projects.title: Internship Project: Automation of Internship Process

projects.shortDescription: Automated intern integration and tracking system.

projects.title: Unity RPG: The Quest for the Shortest Path
projects.description: Developed a game using the Unity engine with pathfinding algorithms like Dijkstra's and A* for sophisticated AI interactions. Leveraged graph theory to dynamically generate maps for unique playthroughs.
features: Randomly generated map for each playthrough
